Model.Items

Class Armor

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.Items.Item
      • Model.Items.Defense
        • Model.Items.Armor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Armor
extends Defense
    Armor is a sub type of class Defense. One of the items a character can be equipped with during the game.
    See Also:
